title: Jerald Bot
caption: Discord Chat Bot
description: Developed Jerald Bot, a Discord chatbot designed to answer plant-related questions, as an introduction to APIs. The project involved using Discordâ€™s API to build the chatbot and integrating OpenAI's API to generate relevant responses and Giphy's API for GIFs. Inspired by my girlfriend, I incorporated plant-themed functionality to make the bot interactive.

This project gave me practical experience using Python to create a meaningful application, with an introduction to API integration. Jerald Bot serves as a fun, interactive tool for plant enthusiasts and a personal project to explore new technologies.
seoDescription: JeraldBot is a custom Discord chatbot designed for plant-related queries, leveraging Python, Discord.py, and OpenAI. It integrates with Giphy for fun, personalized responses.
